sequence:
Zara Character Story - Storia di Rosa

<size=45>Chapter 7: Starry Night</size>

scripts.say: All right, we're here. This is the perfect spot.
Zara had pulled me to a bench, where we sat admiring the starry sky.
Thanks again for today, Commander~ Here, I got you a sports drink.
Not to mention the part where I made you my pack mule for the day. Thanks, and sorry. Hehe, it wasn't so bad, was it?
Zara was staring directly into my eyes.
Even as dark as it is, I can see it in your eyes, Commander. I can see that dissatisfaction.
"I want to show her my strong and heroic side! I don't want to be prey that she toys with." That's what your eyes are saying. They're full of frustration that you've never succeeded.
But I love toying with you, my prey. I never get tired of it, hehe~
In the end, Zara was always two steps ahead of me. Any time I tried to resist her, she always brought me to heel.
... The stars really are beautiful. Heh heh. The night actually brings back some pretty ugly memories. But even so, I can't help but admire the way the stars twinkle.
They carry with them people's hopes and dreams, across tens, hundreds, thousands of light years out to the edge of the universe.
But you're different, Commander. You're right here with me.
The stars are cold and distant, but you're real. I can touch you.
I know I overdo it sometimes, but I really much prefer the prey caught in my traps to some smooth and confident fleet officer.
Hehe, looking into this face of yours just makes me want to tease you more.
Sooner or later, this game of ours is going to end. And we'll be right back where we started.
So...
Zara clung to my arm.
I won't be a star far off in the sky either. I'll be here with you.
Commander, I'll always be here with you.
Maybe she'd gotten too tired. Zara rested her head on my chest.
Don't you think it'd be scandalous if someone saw us like this?
But... let's keep it up... just a little while longer... okay?
